alert.note: Alert for Bay; Calhoun; Gulf; Washington (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 18 at 1:53PM EDT until June 18 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 230 PM EDT/130 PM CDT/ FOR NORTHWESTERN GULF...BAY...WESTERN CALHOUN AND WASHINGTON COUNTIES IN THE PANHANDLE OF FLORIDA... At 152 PM EDT/1252 PM CDT/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Vernon to 8 miles northwest of Lynn Haven to 6 miles south of Panama City Beach, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Panama City Beach, Callaway, Vernon, Springfield, Mexico Beach, Hiland Park, Tyndall Air Force Base, Wewahitchka, Bradford, Live Oak, Parker, Wausau, Westville, Ebro, Moose Pond, Whitehead Crossroads, Allanton and Dirego Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
